resources.string: It is required to run the GPS of the device and fetch the possibly accurate location details
Used to fetch the address of the given location
Used to show a precise location data in case GPS is unavailable or until available
Used to check if WiFi connectivity is available
Used to check if network is available and is connected

It is hard to make an app and even harder to make everything working flawlessly. In such situations it is always nice to have some support, if you found an issue please file an issue on Github expressing your problems or email me, it is quick and easy and it will only make the app better

Looks your device does not support Google Play Services, it could be because of faulty implementation or your device manufacturer did not installed it, either way it is going to break some of the apps\' functionality
